attributes.action: Re-open the independent investigation into BAE Systems bribery allegations reguarding sales of arms to Saudi Arabia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government or a more independent organization to re-open the investigation into BAE Systems suspected corruption after the suspicious termination of the investigation, or a fuller, clearer explanation than "for reasons of national security".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
